name: lom_atom
description: Alternative implementation of eigenmethod mol_atom state management library

scripts.release.major: npm test && npm run build && standard-version -r major && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release.minor: npm test && npm run build && standard-version -r minor && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.build: rimraf dist && rollup -c && cp index.js.flow.tpl $npm_package_main.flow && cp index.js.flow.tpl $npm_package_module.flow
scripts.watch: chokidar --initial -d 2000 -t 1000 'src/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build && cp -rvf *.js src dist $npm_package_config_dest/node_modules/lom_atom'

author: Stefan Zerkalica <zerkalica@gmail.com>
